openwaterhg 1.3.0.9000
  • Reference

Create a Variable of Sampling Events

Source: R/modify_dataframes.R
add_samplingevent.Rd

Creates a new variable named SamplingEvent, which contains standardized sampling event names. This variable is derived from the SampleDate variable. These sampling event names will be used in plots of the data.

add_samplingevent(df)

Arguments

df

The dataframe to add the SamplingEvent variable to. Dataframe must have a variable named SampleDate. SampleDate must be "date" class. Each observation under the SampleDate variable must have one of the following values:

  • 2014-12-22

  • 2014-12-23

  • 2016-03-15

  • 2016-03-16

  • 2017-01-11

  • 2017-01-12

  • 2017-01-24

  • 2017-01-25

  • 2017-01-31

  • 2017-02-01

  • 2017-02-14

  • 2017-02-16

  • 2017-03-01

  • 2017-03-02

  • 2017-03-15

  • 2017-03-16

  • 2017-03-28

  • 2017-03-29

  • 2017-04-11

  • 2017-04-12

  • 2017-04-25

  • 2017-04-26

Value

A new character variable named SamplingEvent, which contains standardized sampling event names derived from the SampleDate variable.
